name: MeetRubeWaddell
0:
”Alexa, open Meet Rube Waddell”
”Tell me about Rube”
”Teach me”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: meet rube waddell
des: Many sports writers around the turn of the century credit George "Rube" Waddell with saving the American League from bankruptcy. He had a great arm, but the mentality of a seven-year-old.When Rube wasn't playing baseball he was fighting fires or wresting alligators. He was the biggest draw in the American League.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
